short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension which generates quick navigation links to different websites for the Indian stock market.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension is a game-changer for Indian traders using sites like ChartInk and Screener to find stocks.

With this extension, you can instantly add quick links to your ChartInk results, allowing you to jump straight to TradingView to view candlestick charts. No more wasting time searching for stocks on TradingView!

Plus, it adds a handy navigation bar on popular trading websites, making it super easy to view stock details and analysis across different platforms. Transform your trading experience and save time with this must-have tool!
